entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_GENERIC_COMMAND
entry.description: Immediatedly start a generic mission
entry.param: Null, Elevator %, Depth m, or Altitude m

Interpret bytes as 32-bit unsigned int Byte 0 - Lateral Enum: 0=null, 1=rudder, 2=heading Byte 1 - Vertical Enum: 0=null, 1=elevator, 2=depth, 3=altitude Byte 2 - Longitudinal Enum: 0=null, 1=thrust, 2=speed Byte 3 - Roll Enum: 0=null, 1=aileron, 2=roll

entry.name: MAV_CMD_DO_ZIG_ZIG_COMMAND
entry.description: Immediately start a zig-zag mission for lateral model detection
entry.param: Oscillate about this heading. If NaN, use heading at mission start
Heading change before flipping rudder command
Interpret bytes as 32-bit unsigned int Byte 0 - Longitudinal Enum: 0=null, 1=thrust, 2=speed Byte 1 - Number of repetions

message.name: MAGOTHY_ECHOSOUNDER
message.description: Reports depth and temperature measured by echosounder
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude of the number.
Water Depth (Low Frequency) (m)
Water Depth (High Frequency) (m)
Water Temperature (C)

message.name: MAGOTHY_MISSION_TELEMETRY
message.field: Unix Timestamp
Vehicle Controller uptime
Elasped time of currently executing mission item (s) - NaN if not in mission
Remaining time of currently executing mission item (s) - NaN if not in mission
Elasped time of entire mission (s) - NaN if not in mission
Remaining time of entire mission (s) - NaN if not in mission
Distance to target (waypoint/loiter/etc) (m) - NaN if not in mission or not geo based
Trackline offtrack error (m) - NaN if not in mission or not in trackline
UUID of most recent mode change

message.name: MAGOTHY_WATER_CURRENT
message.description: Reports speed and direction of water current
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude of the number.
Water Current Speed (m/s)
Water Current Direction (deg)
Water Current Age (s)
